name: youtube_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v2.
Tool description: Youtube API for search, videos, channels, trending, recommendation
API description: This endpoint will a specific number of videos for a specific keyword, note that the maximum is 40 videos per request

lang.description: The language code for the search results. Defaults to 'en'.

country.description: The country code for the search results. Defaults to 'us'.
